articles.author: Marc Malkin
articles.title: Tonys Broadcast Finds Path Forward as Producers Meet WGA Requests - Variety
articles.description: UPDATED: Tony Awards Productions has altered the upcoming awards ceremony to conform with requests made by the Writers Guild of America, the union announced Monday evening. As a result, the WGA no …
